非常硬核的射击游戏，cs系列经久不衰，好玩又有挑战性。想要良好的游戏体验还是需要多加练习，希望v设可以处理一下外挂，给广大cs玩家提供一个良好的游戏环境，不能让外挂搞臭了。

I am playing DMG competitive.

Two of the players have less than 5 kills by the end of the game
Third is a less-than-medium skill-wise.
Fourth is panically afraid to go through the smokes even despite the fact the hostage carrier was heard jumping out of the office and into the snowy wastes outside.

Nerve destruction simulator 2020, just like COVID.

Update: Randomly hit a bud by a knife got banned for 7 days. And that was when I was aiming for the ground.

200 / 215 hours spent crying i am sad as my girlfriend (now ex girlfriend) stacy broke up with me she says im not comitted to the relationship she broke up with me while i was playing csgo now i cant play it without it reminding me of her now shes dating my EX best friend mike tyson and is living 9 states away from me other than the awful memories its a good game 2/ 7 stars would recomend
